body:
@alevohin please pick this up, and keep in mind [these instructions](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/17/how-xdsd-is-different.html). Any technical questions - ask right here

The budget here is **30 mins**, which is exactly how much time will be paid for, when the task is [completed](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/15/definition-of-done.html)

@dmarkov source code from master doesn't pass qulice check, is it normal?
Example from log:
[INFO] --- qulice-maven-plugin:0.10:check (jcabi-check) @ jcabi-aether ---
[INFO] LICENSE found: file:C:/develop/odesk/jcabi-aether/LICENSE.txt
[ERROR] \src\aws-it\aether-test\client\pom.xml[101]: Lines in file should end with Unix-like end of line (RegexpMultilineCheck)
[ERROR] \src\aws-it\aether-test\invoker.properties[1]: Lines in file should end with Unix-like end of line (RegexpMultilineCheck)
[ERROR] \src\aws-it\aether-test\plugin\pom.xml[90]: Lines in file should end with Unix-like end of line (RegexpMultilineCheck)
[ERROR] \src\aws-it\aether-test\plugin\src\main\java\com\jcabi\aether\plugin\package-info.java[1]: Missing a header - not enough lines in file. (HeaderCheck)
...
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time: 02:22 min
[INFO] Finished at: 2015-01-01T11:13:38+04:00
[INFO] Final Memory: 30M/74M
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal com.qulice:qulice-maven-plugin:0.10:check (jcabi-check) on project jcabi-aether: Failure: 272 Checkstyle violations (see log above) -> [Help 1]
@alevohin No, it's not. Every time you see an issue, create a new ticket
@dmarkov PR #42 merged to master. Please check and close issue.

@alevohin **30 mins** was added to your account, many thanks for your contribution!

+30 to your rating, your total score is [+165](http://www.netbout.com/b/35105?open=rating)

issue.title: Add support for Eclipse Aether (used by Maven >= 3.1)
issue.body: Currently jcabi-aether uses only Sonatype Aether, as such it can't be used in projects that need Eclpise Aether.

issue.title: MavenRootArtifact.java:110-115: Retrieve list of children of...
issue.body: Puzzle `4-e727794d` in `src/main/java/com/jcabi/aether/MavenRootArtifact.java:110-115` has to be resolved: Retrieve list of children of given artifact from repository that will not depend on sonatype aether or eclipse aether. Test ClasspathTest.hasToStringWithBrokenDependency and RootArtifactTest.gracefullyResolvesBrokenRootArtifact and RootArtifactTest.resolvesRootArtifact should pass when the method is updated to work in new eclipse aether.

body:
I can not use  this Aether on Maven 3.1, so I have to switch aether library to http://www.eclipse.org/aether/

https://github.com/qxo/jcabi-aether/commit/6317fd43acb41f6662f2934ed3615543ab4fc0d6
